fn.p: References where favipiravir has been used in humans are underlined.

The mortality rate is derived from athe World Health Organization (WHO), bCDC, cPan American Health Organization (PAHO) & WHO, dWestern equine encephalitis ( Spickler, 2017), eArgentine hemorrhagic fever virus infection ( Enria & Maiztegui, 1994), fChikungunya ( Cardona-Ospina, Henao-SanMartin, Paniz-Mondolfi, & Rodriguez-Morales, 2015; Renault, Josseran, & Pierre, 2008), and gWest Nile fever ( Philpott et al., 2019).
